subject: Hockey, Ice
Trades (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The Columbus Blue Jackets acquired left wing Mike Blunden from the Chicago Blackhawks in a trade for right wing Adam Pineault. The Blue Jackets assigned Blunden to their A.H.L. affiliate in Syracuse. The 22-year-old Blunden has tallied three goals and seven assists in 37 games with the Blackhawks’ A.H.L. affiliate this season. He was drafted into the N.H.L. in 2005.
